Sep 13, 2002

Study Says ChevronTexaco Evaded Taxes in Price Scheme

> “ChevronTexaco, the world’s fourth-largest oil company, evaded $3.25 billion in federal and state taxes from 1970 to 2000 through a complex petroleum pricing scheme involving a project in Indonesia, according to a new research paper by two accounting professors.” NY Times
